prompt:
A boldly seductive Korean woman in her 20s on a quiet stair landing, framed waist-up to mid-thigh.
Pose: one knee raised, hips angled forward, torso subtly arched; one hand gripping the railing.
Expression: direct gaze, narrowed half-lidded eyes, lips softly parted, no smile.
Outfit: ribbed knit top + tailored shorts, visible texture and stretch lines.
Lighting: side window spill + pale wall bounce, smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400.
